metadata.title: CVE-2017-12872 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The (1) Htpasswd authentication source in the authcrypt module and (2)SimpleSAML_Session class in SimpleSAMLphp 1.14.11 and earlier allow remoteattackers to conduct timing side-channel attacks by leveraging use of thestandard comparison operator to compare secret material against user input.

criterions.comment: simplesamlphp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
